channel.title: Help please with GetUpText Command
channel.description:
:o hello ... im making a fishing scipt and i have trouble using the getuptext command to find the right sort of fishing spot for lobbies
for example IF getuptext='C' THEN... *EDIT* C for Cage ^^
it doesnt seem to work for me and i do not know why, any suggestions ? all comments appreciated
if GetUpText='C' then mouse(q,w,0,0,true) --- it just does not detect anything :S
EDIT ---IVE FOUND THE ANSWER --OPTION2 COMMAND WORKS BETTER IN MY CASE :) BUT THX FOR MAYBE GOING TO HELP ME !

item.title: Help please with GetUpText Command
item.dc:creator: @Nashi Nashi
item.description:
@Nashi wrote:

GetUpText would return the entire line up the top.
IsUpText(‘C’) would of worked better since it checks if the string your looking for is in the Text up the top not the EXACT text up the top

Read full topic

item.title: Help please with GetUpText Command
item.dc:creator: @d3nd3 d3nd3
item.description:
@d3nd3 wrote:

:o hello …
im making a fishing scipt and i have trouble using the getuptext command to find the right sort of fishing spot for lobbies

for example IF getuptext=‘C’ THEN… EDIT C for Cage ^^

it doesnt seem to work for me and i do not know why, any suggestions ? all comments appreciated

if GetUpText=‘C’ then mouse(q,w,0,0,true) — it just does not detect anything :S

EDIT —IVE FOUND THE ANSWER --OPTION2 COMMAND WORKS BETTER IN MY CASE BUT THX FOR MAYBE GOING TO HELP ME !
